mapper.select:
SELECT EZC_RESERV_BASE.RESERV_NUM AS reservNum /* 예약 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.FACL_CD AS faclCd /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.OFF_YN AS offYn /* 오프라인 여부, CHAR(1) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.EZWEL_ORDER_NUM AS ezwelOrderNum /* 이지웰 주문 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.PARTNER_ORDER_NUM AS partnerOrderNum /* 제휴사 주문 번호, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.FACL_RESERV_NUM AS faclReservNum /* 시설 예약 번호, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.DEVICE_DIV AS deviceDiv /* 디바이스 구분, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.PARTNER_CD AS partnerCd /* 제휴사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.CHANNEL_CD AS channelCd /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.USER_KEY AS userKey /* USER_KEY, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.FACL_NM AS faclNm /* 시설 명, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.TOT_SALE_AMT AS totSaleAmt /* 총 판매 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.CHECK_IN_DD AS checkInDd /* 체크인 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.CHECK_OUT_DD AS checkOutDd /* 체크아웃 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.TOT_ADT_CNT AS totAdtCnt /* 총 성인 수, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.TOT_CHILD_CNT AS totChildCnt /* 총 소아 수, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.GUEST_NM AS guestNm /* 투숙자 명, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.GUEST_MOBILE AS guestMobile /* 투숙자 휴대전화, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.GUEST_EMAIL AS guestEmail /* 투숙자 이메일, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.RESERV_FAX_SEND_DT AS reservFaxSendDt /* 예약 팩스 발송 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.RESERV_FAX_RECV_DT AS reservFaxRecvDt /* 예약 팩스 수신 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.RESERV_DT AS reservDt /* 예약 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.RESERV_CANCEL_DT AS reservCancelDt /* 예약 취소 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.RESERV_STATUS AS reservStatus /* 예약 상태, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.ORDER_NM AS orderNm /* 회원명 new */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.ORDER_MOBILE AS orderMobile /* 회원전화번호 new */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.ORDER_EMAIL AS orderEmail /* 회원이메일주소 new */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.RESERV_REQUEST AS reservRequest /* 요청내용 new */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.USER_ID AS userId /* 회원 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ FROM EZC_RESERV_BASE /* 예약 기본 정보 */ ,EZC_CHANNEL_MNG /* 채널 */ ,EZC_FACL /* 시설 정보 */ ,EZC_AREA_CD /* 지역 코드 */ ,EZC_CITY_CD /* 도시 코드 */ ,EZC_PARTNER /* 제휴사 정보 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.CHANNEL_CD = EZC_CHANNEL_MNG.CHANNEL_CD AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.FACL_CD = EZC_FACL.FACL_CD AND EZC_FACL.AREA_CD = EZC_AREA_CD.AREA_CD AND EZC_AREA_CD.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.OFF_YN = #{offYn, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 오프라인 여부, CHAR(1) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.RESERV_NUM = #{reservNum, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예약 번호, NUMBER(0,22), EZC_RESERV_BASE_PK(P),SYS_C0011599(C) */ AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.FACL_CD = #{faclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22), FK_EZC_FACL_EZC_RESERV_BASE(R),SYS_C0011600(C) */ AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.PARTNER_CD = #{partnerCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 코드, VARCHAR2(20), FK_EZC_PARTNER_EZC_RESERV_BASE(R),SYS_C0011603(C) */ AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.CHANNEL_CD = #{channelCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10), FK_EZC_CHANNEL_MNG_EZC_RESERV_(R),SYS_C0011604(C) */

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM EZC_RESERV_BASE /* 예약 기본 정보 */ ,EZC_CHANNEL_MNG /* 채널 */ ,EZC_FACL /* 시설 정보 */ ,EZC_AREA_CD /* 지역 코드 */ ,EZC_CITY_CD /* 도시 코드 */ ,EZC_PARTNER /* 제휴사 정보 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.CHANNEL_CD = EZC_CHANNEL_MNG.CHANNEL_CD AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.FACL_CD = EZC_FACL.FACL_CD AND EZC_FACL.AREA_CD = EZC_AREA_CD.AREA_CD AND EZC_AREA_CD.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.OFF_YN = #{offYn, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 오프라인 여부, CHAR(1) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.RESERV_NUM = #{reservNum, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예약 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.FACL_CD = #{faclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.EZWEL_ORDER_NUM = #{ezwelOrderNum, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 이지웰 주문 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.PARTNER_ORDER_NUM = #{partnerOrderNum, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 주문 번호, VARCHAR2(100) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.FACL_RESERV_NUM = #{faclReservNum, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 시설 예약 번호, VARCHAR2(100) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.DEVICE_DIV = #{deviceDiv, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 디바이스 구분, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.PARTNER_CD = #{partnerCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.CHANNEL_CD = #{channelCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.USER_KEY = #{userKey, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* USER_KEY, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.FACL_NM = #{faclNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 시설 명, VARCHAR2(100) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.TOT_SALE_AMT = #{totSaleAmt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 총 판매 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.CHECK_IN_DD = #{checkInDd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 체크인 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.CHECK_OUT_DD = #{checkOutDd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 체크아웃 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.TOT_ADT_CNT = #{totAdtCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 총 성인 수, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.TOT_CHILD_CNT = #{totChildCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 총 소아 수, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.GUEST_NM = #{guestNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 투숙자 명, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.GUEST_MOBILE = #{guestMobile, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 투숙자 휴대전화, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.GUEST_EMAIL = #{guestEmail, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 투숙자 이메일, VARCHAR2(100) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.RESERV_FAX_SEND_DT = #{reservFaxSendDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 예약 팩스 발송 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.RESERV_FAX_RECV_DT = #{reservFaxRecvDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 예약 팩스 수신 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.RESERV_DT = #{reservDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 예약 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.RESERV_CANCEL_DT = #{reservCancelDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 예약 취소 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.RESERV_STATUS = #{reservStatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 예약 상태, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.REG_ID = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.REG_DT = #{regDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.USER_ID = #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 회원 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW__NUM, RECORDS.* FROM ( /* SQL Body Start */ SELECT EZC_RESERV_BASE.RESERV_NUM AS reservNum /* 예약 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.FACL_CD AS faclCd /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.OFF_YN AS offYn /* 오프라인 여부, CHAR(1) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.EZWEL_ORDER_NUM AS ezwelOrderNum /* 이지웰 주문 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.PARTNER_ORDER_NUM AS partnerOrderNum /* 제휴사 주문 번호, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.FACL_RESERV_NUM AS faclReservNum /* 시설 예약 번호, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.DEVICE_DIV AS deviceDiv /* 디바이스 구분, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.PARTNER_CD AS partnerCd /* 제휴사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.CHANNEL_CD AS channelCd /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.USER_KEY AS userKey /* USER_KEY, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.FACL_NM AS faclNm /* 시설 명, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.TOT_SALE_AMT AS totSaleAmt /* 총 판매 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.CHECK_IN_DD AS checkInDd /* 체크인 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.CHECK_OUT_DD AS checkOutDd /* 체크아웃 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.TOT_ADT_CNT AS totAdtCnt /* 총 성인 수, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.TOT_CHILD_CNT AS totChildCnt /* 총 소아 수, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.GUEST_NM AS guestNm /* 투숙자 명, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.GUEST_MOBILE AS guestMobile /* 투숙자 휴대전화, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.GUEST_EMAIL AS guestEmail /* 투숙자 이메일, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.RESERV_FAX_SEND_DT AS reservFaxSendDt /* 예약 팩스 발송 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.RESERV_FAX_RECV_DT AS reservFaxRecvDt /* 예약 팩스 수신 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.RESERV_DT AS reservDt /* 예약 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.RESERV_CANCEL_DT AS reservCancelDt /* 예약 취소 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.RESERV_STATUS AS reservStatus /* 예약 상태, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.ORDER_NM AS orderNm /* 회원명 new */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.ORDER_MOBILE AS orderMobile /* 회원전화번호 new */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.ORDER_EMAIL AS orderEmail /* 회원이메일주소 new */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.RESERV_REQUEST AS reservRequest /* 요청내용 new */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.USER_ID AS userId /* 회원 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM.RESERV_ROOM_NUM AS reservRoomNum /* 예약 객실 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM.PARTNER_ROOM_ORDER_NUM AS partnerRoomOrderNum /* 제휴사 객실 주문 번호, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM.PARTNER_ROOM_GOODS_CD AS partnerRoomGoodsCd /* 제휴사 객실 상품 코드, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM.ROOM_NM AS roomNm /* 객실 명, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM.ADT_CNT AS adtCnt /* 성인 수, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM.CHILD_CNT AS childCnt /* 소아 수, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM.ROOM_CNT AS roomCnt /* 객실 수, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM.NORMAL_AMT AS normalAmt /* 정상 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM.OPT_AMT AS optAmt /* 옵션 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM.SALE_AMT AS saleAmt /* 판매 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM.STD_USER AS stdUser /* 기준 인원, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM.MAX_USER AS maxUser /* 최대 인원, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM.BED_TYPE AS bedType /* 침대 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM.BREAKFAST_INCLUDE_YN AS breakfastIncludeYn /* 조식 포함 여부, CHAR(1) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM.CANCEL_FEE_RULE AS cancelFeeRule /* 취소 수수료 규정, VARCHAR2(4000) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM.ROOM_STATUS AS roomStatus /* 객실 상태, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM.DIST_ROOM_CD AS distRoomCd /* 직영/숙박 객실 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_FACL.PARTNER_GOODS_CD AS partnerGoodsCd FROM EZC_FACL /* 시설 정보 */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE /* 예약 기본 정보 */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM /* 예약 객실 정보 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_FACL.FACL_CD = EZC_RESERV_BASE.FACL_CD AND EZC_FACL.PARTNER_CD = EZC_RESERV_BASE.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.RESERV_NUM = EZC_RESERV_ROOM.RESERV_NUM
AND TO_DATE(EZC_RESERV_BASE.RESERV_DT, 'yyyyMMdd') BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'yyyyMMdd') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'yyyyMMdd')
AND TO_DATE(EZC_RESERV_BASE.CHECK_IN_DD, 'yyyyMMdd') BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'yyyyMMdd') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'yyyyMMdd')
AND TO_DATE(EZC_RESERV_BASE.RESERV_DT, 'yyyyMMdd') BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'yyyyMMdd') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'yyyyMMdd')
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.OFF_YN = #{offYn, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 오프라인 여부, CHAR(1) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.RESERV_NUM = #{reservNum, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예약 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.FACL_CD = #{faclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.EZWEL_ORDER_NUM = #{ezwelOrderNum, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 이지웰 주문 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.PARTNER_ORDER_NUM = #{partnerOrderNum, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 주문 번호, VARCHAR2(100) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.FACL_RESERV_NUM = #{faclReservNum, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 시설 예약 번호, VARCHAR2(100) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.DEVICE_DIV = #{deviceDiv, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 디바이스 구분, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.PARTNER_CD = #{partnerCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.CHANNEL_CD = #{channelCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.USER_KEY = #{userKey, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* USER_KEY, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.FACL_NM = #{faclNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 시설 명, VARCHAR2(100) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.TOT_SALE_AMT = #{totSaleAmt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 총 판매 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.CHECK_IN_DD = #{checkInDd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 체크인 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.CHECK_OUT_DD = #{checkOutDd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 체크아웃 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.TOT_ADT_CNT = #{totAdtCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 총 성인 수, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.TOT_CHILD_CNT = #{totChildCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 총 소아 수, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.GUEST_NM = #{guestNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 투숙자 명, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.GUEST_MOBILE = #{guestMobile, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 투숙자 휴대전화, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.GUEST_EMAIL = #{guestEmail, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 투숙자 이메일, VARCHAR2(100) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.RESERV_FAX_SEND_DT = #{reservFaxSendDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 예약 팩스 발송 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.RESERV_FAX_RECV_DT = #{reservFaxRecvDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 예약 팩스 수신 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.RESERV_DT = #{reservDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 예약 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.RESERV_CANCEL_DT = #{reservCancelDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 예약 취소 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.RESERV_STATUS = #{reservStatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 예약 상태, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.REG_ID = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.REG_DT = #{regDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.USER_ID = #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 회원 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
ORDER BY
EZC_RESERV_BASE.RESERV_DT,
EZC_RESERV_BASE.CHECK_IN_DD,
EZC_RESERV_BASE.RESERV_NUM DESC /* SQL Body End */ ) RECORDS WHERE ROWNUM <= ((#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC})) ) WHERE ROW__NUM > (#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}-1)*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC}

VARCHAR2(8) */ ,ORDER_NM = #{orderNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 회원명 new */ ,ORDER_MOBILE = #{orderMobile, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 회원전화번호 new */ ,ORDER_EMAIL = #{orderEmail, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 회원이메일주소 new */ NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( RESERV_NUM /* 예약 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,FACL_CD /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,OFF_YN /* 오프라인 여부, CHAR(1) */ ,EZWEL_ORDER_NUM /* 이지웰 주문 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,PARTNER_ORDER_NUM /* mapper.delete: DELETE FROM EZC_RESERV_BASE /* 예약 기본 정보 */ WHERE 1=1 AND RESERV_NUM = #{reservNum, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예약 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ AND FACL_CD = #{faclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ AND PARTNER_CD = #{partnerCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */ AND CHANNEL_CD = #{channelCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
